short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract YouTube subtitles, including section titles, with one click and copy them to the clipboard or download as a TXT file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily extract subtitles, complete with section titles, from any YouTube videos - including Shorts - with this handy extension. 

No more struggling with complicated tools or missing out on important information. With just one click, you can copy the subtitles directly to your clipboard or download them as a TXT file for later reference. 

This extension sets itself apart by including section titles, ensuring you capture the full context of the video. 

Whether you're learning a language, creating content, or simply want to review what was said, this extension makes it a breeze. Try it out now and simplify your subtitle extraction process!
